price: Da li su nevjernici vaši bolji od njih ili vi u knjigama nebeskim imate kakvu garanciju?!
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
